title: About Me
text:
Areas of Expertise

Data Science & Statistical Modeling
I work extensively with survival analysis, Bayesian inference, generalized linear models, time series forecasting, and genomics studies.


Data Science & Visualization
I have hands-on experience using tools like SQL, Tableau, and Power BI to create dynamic, insightful reports. Clear and effective storytelling is key to making data accessible, and I strive to bridge that gap.
